abstract: Northern Ireland's Michael Hoey takes third-round lead at Dunhill Links Championship golf tournament; other golf results noted.
snippet: Michael Hoey moved closer to giving Northern Ireland another big win, taking a three-shot lead after three rounds of the Dunhill Links Championship at St. Andrews, Scotland.
lead_paragraph: Michael Hoey moved closer to giving Northern Ireland another big win, taking a three-shot lead after three rounds of the Dunhill Links Championship at St. Andrews, Scotland.
